it.polimi.ingsw - package it.polimi.ingsw
The game's main package.
it.polimi.ingsw.client - package it.polimi.ingsw.client
All the classes pertaining to the clients.
it.polimi.ingsw.client.modelview - package it.polimi.ingsw.client.modelview
Reduced versions of model classes that are used by the clients and sent over the network.
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui - package it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui
Contains the classes of the two user interfaces and their common interface.
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.cli - package it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.cli
CLI base classes

CLI menu functions
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.controller - package it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.controller
Controllers for receiving and sending messages used by both CLI and GUI.

GUI base classes

GUI's JavaFX controllers.
it.polimi.ingsw.server - package it.polimi.ingsw.server
All the classes pertaining to the server.
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller - package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller
Classes that receive the clients messages and queries the model accordingly.
it.polimi.ingsw.server.exception - package it.polimi.ingsw.server.exception
Custom exception classes
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model - package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model
Classes that contain the game data and that notify the clients of their changes.
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.action - package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.action
The three main actions and their handling methods for disconnection.
it.polimi.ingsw.server.view - package it.polimi.ingsw.server.view
Server side view classes that interface with the network.
it.polimi.ingsw.utils - package it.polimi.ingsw.utils
Utility classes that relate to the network, to advanced functionalities or to both client and server.
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.networking - package it.polimi.ingsw.utils.networking
Interfaces for network messages.
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.networking.transmittables - package it.polimi.ingsw.utils.networking.transmittables
Status messages and network message packages.

Messages sent by the client and their interface.

Messages sent by the client during the game phase.

Messages sent by the client during the setup phase.

Messages that relate to saving the game.

Messages that relate to handling disconnections.

Messages sent by the server.

Classes used to implement the observer pattern.
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.persistence - package it.polimi.ingsw.utils.persistence
Classes that represent the data saved and restored when saving the game.
